stimulusHtml: While the exact function and meaning of such works remain unknown, scholars have theorized that they were intended to facilitate a connection between the physical and spiritual worlds because of the

choicesHtml: open cavity in the center, which likely served as a place to hold ritual offerings
interlocking square and cylindrical forms, which are believed to symbolize different realms
finely incised lines, which may have helped individuals to identify and interpret constellations in the night sky
dragon motifs, since dragons were believed to be messengers from the gods
